params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the CTRL model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented by theinputs_ids passed when calling CTRLModel or TFCTRLModel.

params.name: n_positions
params.description: The maximum sequence length that this model might ever be used with. Typically set this to something largejust in case (e.g., 512 or 1024 or 2048).

params.name: n_embd
params.description: Dimensionality of the embeddings and hidden states.

params.name: dff
params.description: Dimensionality of the inner dimension of the feed forward networks (FFN).

params.name: n_layer
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: n_head
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: resid_pdrop
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, encoder, and pooler.

params.name: embd_pdrop
params.description: The dropout ratio for the embeddings.

params.name: layer_norm_epsilon
params.description: The epsilon to use in the layer normalization layers

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: use_cache
params.description: Whether or not the model should return the last key/values attentions (not used by all models).
